Class ToDo

java.lang.Object
model.ToDo
public class ToDo extends Object

A ToDo in the model.

The class provides methods to manage the ToDo's state, attributes and its user sharing status.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ToDo

      public ToDo(int todoID, boolean completed, String title, String description, String activityURL, String imageURL, LocalDateTime expiryDate, int ownerUserID, String backgroundColor)

      Instantiates a new, not completed, ToDo with the specified attributes.

      Parameters:
      todoID - the id
      completed - the completion state as a boolean (true for Complete, false for Not Complete)
      title - the title
      description - the description
      activityURL - the activity url
      imageURL - the image url
      expiryDate - the expiry date
      ownerUserID - the owner's username
      backgroundColor - the background color
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if title is null or blank

  • Method Details

    • isExpired

      public boolean isExpired()

      Checks if ToDo is expired.

      Returns:
      returns true if ToDo's expiry date is past the current date and time, otherwise false

    • isCompleted

      public boolean isCompleted()

      Checks if ToDo is completed.

      Returns:
      returns true if ToDo is completed, otherwise false

    • changeCompletionState

      public void changeCompletionState()

      Changes ToDo state from not completed to completed and vice versa.

    • getToDoID

      public int getToDoID()

      Gets the ToDo's ID.

      public String getBackgroundColor()

      Gets the ToDo's background color.

      Returns:
      the background color as an hexadecimal RBG string in the "#RRGGBB" format

      public int getOwnerUserID()

      Gets the ToDo's owner User's ID.

    • isSharedWith

      public boolean isSharedWith(String username)

      Checks if the ToDo is shared with an User.

      Parameters:
      username - the username
      Returns:
      true if shared, else false

    • addSharedUser

      public int addSharedUser(String username)

      Shares the ToDo with an User.

      Parameters:
      username - the username
      Returns:
      returns 0 if successful, returns -1 if ToDo is already shared with user
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if username is null or blank

    • removeSharedUser

      public int removeSharedUser(String username)

      Unshares the ToDo with an User.

      Parameters:
      username - the username
      Returns:
      returns 0 if successful, returns -1 if ToDo isn't shared with the user
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if username is null or blank
